Class NetconfDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.sal.connect.netconf.NetconfDevice

    RemoteDevice<NetconfSessionCapabilities,NetconfMessage>

    public final class NetconfDevice
extends java.lang.Object
implements RemoteDevice<NetconfSessionCapabilities,NetconfMessage>
    This is a mediator between NetconfDeviceCommunicator and NetconfDeviceSalFacade
